article: president robert mugabe told roman catholic bishops who issued a letter blaming him for his country 's political and economic turmoil they had chosen `` a dangerous path , '' and church officials said friday a priest had been briefly detained for passing the pastoral message on to his congregation .
abstract: after priest is arrested mugabe warns catholic bishops over critical pastoral letter
